Package uk.ac.rhul.cs2800

Class CalcView

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
uk.ac.rhul.cs2800.CalcView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewInterface
public class CalcView extends javafx.application.Application implements ViewInterface
The CalcView class that is filled by the fxml loader. This class was inspired by Dave Cohen's MVC-separated code and MVCJavaFX.
Author:
zkac151
